author: chfast
content: If we ban `ORIGIN` can we also ban `GASPRICE`?

author: lightclient
content: I think `GASPRICE` is actually useful for paying transaction sponsors?

author: chfast
content: There is no `GAS` in EOF ðŸ™‚

author: big_tech_sux
content: i think gasprice is useful to inspect

author: big_tech_sux
content: you can send value based on gasprice for instance

author: _shemnon
content: But you have to guess the gas used to make sense of it.

author: _shemnon
content: Unless we can count on contract authors to always take the multipler from external data I am a bit concerned GASPRICE could wedge some contracts again if dramatic gas schedules change.  I would support removing it but won't push.
